description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖南省永州市宁远县的行政管理机关，为正县处级人民政府。
description.en: The administrative organ of Ningyuan County, Yongzhou, Hunan Province, People's Republic of China. It is a county-level people's government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任宁远县人民政府县长。
description.en: Chinese politician, current County Mayor of the Ningyuan County People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖南省永州市的行政管理机关。
description.en: The administrative organ of Yongzhou City, Hunan Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 宁远县的国家权力机关。
description.en: The organ of state power in Ningyuan County.

nodes.id: 宁远县人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 宁远县人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 宁远县人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The standing body of the Ningyuan County People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中国共产党宁远县人民政府党组

zh-cn: 中国共产党宁远县人民政府党组

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在宁远县人民政府中设立的领导机构。
description.en: The leading party group of the Chinese Communist Party established within the Ningyuan County People's Government.

en: Constitution of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的根本大法。
description.en: The fundamental law of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖南省的行政管理机关。
description.en: The administrative organ of Hunan Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任宁远县人民政府县长、永州市人民政府副市长，后因严重违纪违法被查处。
description.en: Chinese politician, former County Mayor of the Ningyuan County People's Government and Deputy Mayor of the Yongzhou Municipal People's Government, who was later investigated for serious violations of discipline and law.

nodes.id: 中国共产党湖南省纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党湖南省纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党湖南省的纪律检查机关。
description.en: The discipline inspection body of the Chinese Communist Party in Hunan Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖南省的国家监察机关。
description.en: The state supervisory commission of Hunan Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 指开除中国共产党党籍和公职的纪律处分。
description.en: Refers to the disciplinary action of being expelled from the Chinese Communist Party and dismissed from public office.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任宁远县人民政府县长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former County Mayor of the Ningyuan County People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任宁远县人民政府县长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former County Mayor of the Ningyuan County People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任宁远县人民政府县长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former County Mayor of the Ningyuan County People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任宁远县人民政府县长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former County Mayor of the Ningyuan County People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 宁远县人民政府的业务上级机构是永州市人民政府。
description.en: The business superior of the Ningyuan County People's Government is the Yongzhou Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 宁远县人民政府的组织上级机构是宁远县人民代表大会。
description.en: The organizational superior of the Ningyuan County People's Government is the Ningyuan County People's Congress.

relationships.target: 宁远县人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 宁远县人民政府的组织上级机构是宁远县人民代表大会常务委员会。
description.en: The organizational superior of the Ningyuan County People's Government is the Standing Committee of the Ningyuan County People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 《中华人民共和国宪法》是宁远县人民政府的授权法源。
description.en: The Constitution of the People's Republic of China is the authorizing legal source for the Ningyuan County People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 根据1999年规定，湖南省人民政府为宁远县人民政府制发印章。
description.en: According to the 1999 regulations, the Hunan Provincial People's Government issues the official seal for the Ningyuan County People's Government.

relationships.source: 中国共产党湖南省纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 因涉嫌严重违纪违法，刘卫华接受中国共产党湖南省纪律检查委员会的纪律审查。
description.en: Due to suspected serious violations of discipline and law, Liu Weihua was subjected to disciplinary review by the Hunan Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 因涉嫌严重违纪违法，刘卫华接受湖南省监察委员会的监察调查。
description.en: Due to suspected serious violations of discipline and law, Liu Weihua was subjected to supervisory investigation by the Hunan Provincial Supervisory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 2024年4月，刘卫华遭到开除党籍和开除公职（双开）的处分。
description.en: In April 2024, Liu Weihua was punished by being expelled from the Party and dismissed from public office (Shuang kai).

description.zh-cn: 宁远县是永州市下辖的一个县。
description.en: Ningyuan County is a county under the jurisdiction of Yongzhou City.

description.zh-cn: 永州市是湖南省下辖的一个市。
description.en: Yongzhou is a city under the jurisdiction of Hunan Province.

description.zh-cn: 宁远县人民政府是宁远县的行政管理机关。
description.en: The Ningyuan County People's Government is the administrative organ of Ningyuan County.
